about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm Yorick, a curious and driven student in Software Engineering based in Zwolle. I love solving problems with code and turning ideas into working software.
about.paragraph2: Learning new things and applying them in real-world projects motivates me. Whether itâ€™s frontend or backend, I enjoy building solid, user-focused solutions and working in teams using methods like Scrum.
about.paragraph3: Outside of my studies, I work on freelance web projects and keep exploring new tech. I aim to grow every day and contribute with dedication and creativity.
